coldbox.system.logging
Class LogLevels

WEB-INF.cftags.component
        coldbox.system.logging.LogLevels

public class LogLevels

extends WEB-INF.cftags.component

The available log levels in LogBox. Log levels available in the this scope: OFF=-1, FATAL=0, ERROR=1, WARN=2, INFO=3, DEBUG=4
